Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I first purchased KSP 2 years ago but stopped playing after a couple of weeks. I decided to pick it back up a couple of weeks ago and downloaded 0.23, now its awesome!

I have cracked rendezvous and docking, and been as far as Duna so far. Im really looking forward to seeing how career mode develops - early days yet.

Anyway here is my latest creation, it was supposed to be the apollo Lunar module but I got bored halfway through and applied a bit of artistic licence!

Here is the front

Here is the back on Minimus

It has a proper descent stage with its own engine and tank, once you are happy a hot key activates the docking port decoupler and fires the assent stage engines

the assent stage has 360 liquid fuel and a fair amount of mono propellent for a rendezvous with a command module

If I could figure out how to share it I will, loving the community on here guys so well done and thank you Squad for making this game!

Welcome to the community TheFactory

That is one impressive lunar lander, and I'm sure a lot of people here would like to take it for a spin, when I share craft files I put the contents of the .craft on pastebin, works well enough.

If this is a taste of what you are capable of with stock parts it'd be cool to see more from you

Thats a nice thing to say so thanks! I can build pretty much whatever I think of, this needs optimising as this is only the second version of it, the plate near the window obstructs the view for IVA so once ive sorted that ill paste the craft file to pastebin for you!
